text: Takheun meuiman kamoe keu Tuhan Deungon phireuman lam kitab Allah Peue nyang geupeutron keunoe bak kamoe Dilee nibak nyoe bak Nabiyullah Nabi Ibrahim Nabi Ismail Ishak lagi Ya ªqob pih sudah Ngon aneuk cuco ureueng nyan teuma Musa ngon Isa pih lom meutamah Lom nyang geupeutron bak nabi-nabi Nyang laen lagi peurintah Allah Bandum ureueng nyan hana meubeda Kitab nyang sama tron nibak Allah Kamoe peujok droe bandum bak Tuhan Tamong Iseulam hana meuilah
